item.title: Practice Questions and Written Responses (2)
item.description: Practice 8 Some people believe that we should not discuss about the private activities of the popular people, like movie stars and singers. Do you agree? Why? Practice 9 Female and male university students should have separate residence halls.

item.title: Practice Questions and Written Responses (1)
item.description: Practice 1 Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? Decisions made by a group are always better than decisions made by individuals. I agree with the statement that group decisions are better.

item.title: Recitation of Model Essay
item.description: Preference 1 Some people perfer to travel with their family. Some people perfer to travel alone. Which do you prefer? I perfer to travel alone. For one thing, the schedule for the trip will be more flexible.
